item.title: Bug Mount Android Image File
item.description: Question $ file system.img system.img: Linux rev 1.0 ext2 filesystem data, UUID=4a50462e-52cf-5fab-87a1-49824cdf6b4f (extents) (large files) (huge files) $ sudo mount -t auto system.img system mount: system: failed to setup loop device for system.img. $ sudo mount -t ext2 system.img system mount: system: wrong fs type, bad option, bad superblock on /dev/loop0, missing codepage or helper program, or other error. Tried mount with loop,offset $ file system.img system.img: Linux rev 1.
